meta.title: Layout and Grid System
meta.description: Use the powerful mobile-first flexbox grid (via the <b-container>, <b-row>, <b-form-row> and <b-col> components) to build layouts of all shapes and sizes thanks to a twelve column system, five default responsive tiers, CSS Sass variables and mixins, and dozens of predefined classes.
